caseTitle: Mst. Jameela Bibi (decd) through LRs. v. Mst. Fatima Bibi (decd) through LRs.
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Period of limitation for filing an application for restoration of a civil revision is three years under Article 181 of the First Schedule to the Limitation Act, 1908.
